body.content:
Hi,



I just want to confirm whether you received my last email or not. Please let me know your interest in our content writing services.



Look forward to your reply and input.



Thanks,

David

Marketing Manager





Hi,



Let an expert business content writer take care of your business content writing needs, leaving you the time to focus on your core business.



We are an Indian based content writing agency. We are equipped with a team of qualified and experienced content marketing strategists, copywriters, content writers, editors, and proofreaders with vast experience across various industry verticals.



Our writing rates are quite competitive. They are following:



Articles/Blog – 400 to 500 words – $12

Press Release – 400 to 500 words – $20

Website Content – 150 to 200 words – $10

Metadata Creation – $4 per page

Product Description – 100 to 150 words – $4



Note – All our content copies are handwritten. We do not use any spinning tool for creating content.



Reply with your content writing needs today. We will look into your needs closely and contact you with the right solutions at the earliest.



Thanks,



--

Warm Regards,

David

Marketing Manager
